settings.html:
<style>
    html,body{
        overflow-x: hidden !important;
    }
    .top-heading h2{
        position: relative;
    }
    .top-heading h2:before,.top-heading h2:after{
        content: '';
        width: 0;
        height: 0;
        border: 8px solid transparent;
        border-bottom-color: #7371f9;
        position: absolute;
        top: 2.5px;
    }
    .top-heading h2:before {
        border-left-color: #7371f9;
        right: -30px;
    }
    .top-heading h2:after {
        border-right-color: #7371f9;
        left: -30px;
    }
    
    .icon-box-1:after{
        content: '';
        width: 100%;
        height: 100%;
        position: absolute;
        top: 0;
        left: 0;
        background: #7371f9;
        transition: 0.3s;
        z-index: -1;
        border-radius: 12px;
    }
   .icon-box-1:hover .elementor-widget-container{
        border-color: rgba(0,0,0,0) !important;
        box-shadow: 10px 10px 50px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
    }
    .icon-box-1:hover:after{
        transform: rotate(-10deg);
    }
    .progress-bar .eael-progressbar-line{
        border-radius: 5px;
    }
    .progress-bar .eael-progressbar-line-fill{
        border-radius: 4px 0px 0px 4px;
    }
    
    .filterable-gallery .eael-filter-gallery-control ul{
        margin-bottom: 50px;
    }
    
    .service-icon-box .elementor-icon{
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.1);
        height: 96px;
        width: 96px;
        border-radius: 50%;
        padding: 28px 0px 0px 29px;
    }
    .service-icon-box:hover .elementor-widget-container {
        background: #fff !important;
    }
    .service-icon-box:hover .elementor-icon{
        background: #7371F9;
        color: #fff !important;
    }
    .service-icon-box:hover .elementor-icon-box-title{
        color: #222 !important;
    }
    .service-icon-box:hover .elementor-icon-box-description{
        color: #615978 !important;
    }
    .testimonial-area .elementskit-testimonial-slider{
        overflow: hidden !important;
        padding-top: 50px !important;
    }
    .testimonial-area .swiper-container{
        overflow: unset !important;
    }
    .testimonial-area .elementskit-commentor-header{
        text-align: center !important;
    }
    .testimonial-area .elementskit-icon-content{
        margin-top: -38px;
    }
    .testimonial-area .elementskit-commentor-content p{
        text-align: center;
    }
    .testimonial-area .elementkit-commentor-details {
        justify-content: center !important;
        width: 100%;
    }
    .testimonial-area .elementskit-single-testimonial-slider{
        z-index: 2;
    }
    
</style>
